title: rustc panic with inline asm

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
I hit a compiler panic with some inline asm (which is likely itself buggy at the moment, but of course that shouldn't crash the compiler)

```
note: rustc 1.33.0-nightly (d99a320cb 2018-12-18) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 --crate-type lib
```

```
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_codegen_ssa/mir/operand.rs:135: not immediate: OperandRef(Ref((%Node*:  %43 = load %Node*, %Node** %42, align 64), None, Align { pow2: 6 }) @ TyLayout { ty: Node, details: LayoutDetails { variants: Single { index: 0 }, fields: Arbitrary { offsets: [Size { raw: 0 }], memory_index: [0] }, abi: Aggregate { sized: true }, align: AbiAndPrefAlign { abi: Align { pow2: 6 }, pref: Align { pow2: 6 } }, size: Size { raw: 64 } } })
```

```
thread 'main' panicked at 'Box<Any>', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:600:9
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
             at src/libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49

             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:72

             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:60
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:210

   4: rustc::util::common::panic_hook

             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:492

   7: rustc_errors::Handler::bug
   8: rustc::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}}

  15: rustc_codegen_ssa::mir::codegen_mir
  16: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_instance
  17: rustc_codegen_ssa::mono_item::MonoItemExt::define

  22: <rustc_codegen_llvm::LlvmCodegenBackend as rustc_codegen_utils::codegen_backend::CodegenBackend>::codegen_crate
  23: rustc::util::common::time
  24: rustc_driver::driver::phase_4_codegen

  35: rustc_driver::run

             at src/libstd/rt.rs:59

query stack during panic:
```
